Text: Why is this in a .rar file? *sigh* Damn incompetency.
.rar files compress the file, so the downloading is faster, which means you can get on with your faping sooner. so .rar files are a good thing. :>
please seed if someone have the whole file...plz plz

FWIW....

AVI, WMV MPG et al ARE compression formats. further compression in a container such as RAR and ZIP will generally only regain an extremely minor amount of file space at the cost of greatly increasing the chances of file corruption. this is not a good thing. 
if there is a need to pass protect the files case you should set the (RAR, ZIP) compression to "none" when creating the container. 

not trying to be an ass, just thought i'd throw it out there.

Zargot said:
"rar files compress the file, so the downloading is faster, which means you can get on with your faping sooner. so .rar files are a good thing. :>"
